ModMetaData.name: Awesome Inventory Enchantment
ModMetaData.author: Super-Colliding Super Button
ModMetaData.description:
Awesome Inventory ===Enchantment===
Sprinkle some fairy dust onto some of the gfx
Enchants the following *Things*: * Backpack gizmo * Costume gizmo * Drugs gizmo * Some buttons in loadout edit screen
Can be added to or removed from a save game.
